entry.title: A method for generating a sequence of integers

link.title: A method for generating a sequence of integers

entry.summary: Problem You need the sequence of integers [0, n). Solution using System.Linq; var sequence = (new int[n]).Select((_, i) => i); The basic idea is to create an array with the number of elements you need and map each element to its index (ignoring its value). The result is an IEnumerable<int>. If you need the results in an array or list, you can use ToArray<int>() or ToList&...
